title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Refined
description: This RFC proposes to gather and document comprehensive requirements for the OKRAlignmentAnalyzer tool. The requirements will encompass expected features, functionalities, integration with existing systems (specifically mentioning HRIS, project management tools, and analytics platforms), data sources (OKR databases, user input, and system logs), user roles and permissions (admin, manager, employee, guest), security considerations (data encryption, access controls, auditing), performance and scalability requirements, UI/UX design considerations (consistent with our current platform design, mobile responsive, accessible, multilingual support), non-functional requirements (error handling, reliability, maintainability), and any other relevant aspects such as accessibility and internationalization considerations. Additionally, this task aims to establish a clear project scope, set of deliverables, and define success criteria for the project. Furthermore, it is crucial to outline the roadmap for future iterations and potential integrations with other tools or services, focusing on the first version's core functionality while leaving room for expansion in subsequent phases. Lastly, this task requires input from multiple stakeholders across the organization, including HR, project management, IT, and business leaders.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the OKRAlignmentAnalyzer tool, including the components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing
description: Implement the functionality to ingest and process OKR data from various sources within the organization.

title: Implement Alignment Analysis
description: Develop the core logic to analyze the ingested OKR data and identify potential conflicts or misalignments.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the OKRAlignmentAnalyzer tool, allowing users to view and interact with the analysis results.

title: Implement Reporting and Visualization
description: Develop the functionality to generate reports and visualizations based on the alignment analysis results.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for the OKRAlignmentAnalyzer tool, including automated testing, building, and deployment.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the OKRAlignmentAnalyzer tool to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation for the OKRAlignmentAnalyzer tool, including installation guides, user manuals, and troubleshooting instructions.

title: Perform User Acceptance Testing
description: Conduct thorough user acceptance testing of the OKRAlignmentAnalyzer tool to ensure it meets the defined requirements and is ready for production deployment.
